name: js211_addressbook
description: Read these instructions and understand the requirements FIRST Whiteboard your app Make a code plan Pseudo code and then translate to JavaScript Create a new repo (name it descriptively well), clone it to your local machine and share it with your partner Open the directory and create an index.html and main.js file to fetch a user and display them one at at time Use the API: https://randomuser.me/api/ to fetch a user now use fetch
